line.lineText: Does not appear you are ready to use my wares just yet, come back to me when you gain more experience fishing waters.

I have seen you running around with your fishing rod, aimed to catch the fish and loot hidden beneath these waters. You will need something more than just a rod and some rings to fish here. Chum negates the effects of stillness that these waters afflict you with. I also offer a path to gain and upgrade a fishing amulet.
You might find what you are looking for here.
